content.question: Let <math alttext="h" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>h</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> be a continuous function of <math alttext="x" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>. choices.label: The figure presents a slope field in the x y coordinate plane. The numbers negative 4 and 4 are indicated on both axes. As x increases, the slopes of the segments in quadrant 2 and quadrant 3 decrease from positive values to zero to negative values. As x increases, the slopes of the segments in quadrant 1 and quadrant 4 increase from negative values to zero to positive values.
